{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-827DRU |revision=v2.0R |fcc_date=08/21/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW827DRUV2 |ic_id=6337A-TEW827DRUV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TRENDnet827_2.4GHz_XXXX, TRENDnet827_5GHz_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 MU-MIMO WiFi Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=TRENDnet|prod=105_TEW-827DRU}} This is likely a [[MediaTek]]-based (MT7621 + 2x MT7615 ?) design. *Web GUI: httр://tew-827dru __NOINDEX__
